document_data.name: Donya Silver
document_data.mainbody: Matriarch '''Donya Silver''' was the matriarch of the [[Silver (half-elf house)|Silver]] house of [[half-elves]] around [[1368 DR]], residing at [[Silverhall]], the family home in [[Velprintalar]], [[Aglarond]]. She was a personal friend to [[Alassra Silverhand|the Simbul]].
